hero.title: AvenEzer
hero.subtitle:
AvenEzer is an international digital platform created to showcase businesses, services and professional offerings, and to help users navigate across different cities and countries.

The platform brings together technology, a structured ecosystem and a community of contributors who take part in its development.

platformToday.title: The platform today
paragraphs: At the moment, AvenEzer operates as an MVP web platform.
bullets: join the ecosystem at an early stage,
test approaches and shape the future product structure.

mvpNote.title: Note about the MVP
paragraphs: The MVP is an initial version of the platform and may change as the product evolves.

nextStage.title: Next stage
paragraphs: The next stage of AvenEzer’s development is a mobile app that expands access and makes the experience more convenient for businesses and users.
The mobile app is in planning and development. Features and launch timelines are defined gradually.
